inclusion.criterion: midluteal phase of their cycle, and will be enrolled if a serum progesterone level is >3ng/ml.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Healthy women of reproductive age (18-39 years old) with BMI 18-30 kg/m2
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Regular menses for the last 3 months
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Women using copper IUD, sterilization, or barrier methods as current or preferred birth control method, and women reporting exclusive sex with women
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Any contraindications to progesterone contraception per teh CDC Medical Eligibility Criteria (Category 3 or 4)
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: On medications that can alter, or be altered by, progesterone contraceptive steroid hormone (e.g., aminoglutethimide or other anti-steroid medication)
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Use of any hormonal contraceptive pill, patch, or vaginal ring in the month prior to recruitment
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Use of depot-medroxyprogesterone acetate in teh 10 months prior to recruitment
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: History of allergic reaction to depot medroxyprogesterone acetate (rash, urticaria, anaphylaxis)
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: The patient has a history of acne and mild hirsutism, with elevated testosterone levels. She also has irregular menstrual cycles and nipple discharge. However, she is on stable doses of octreotide LAR for her acromegaly diagnosis.
